name: City Sniper Shooting 3D
description:
Missions are waiting for you, take one of the snipers and shoot the enemies.

Enemies have taken the city under control. As a professional sniper shooter, you are called to defeat the enemy. Take your sniper rifle and... TO BATTLE

MISSION TYPES
- Attack - kill enemies
- Run - shoot running enemies
- Waves - defeat waves of enemy's attack
- Survive - survive hot shooting battle

FEATURES
- Virtual money - you can earn money during game and spend it in market to buy snipers, aids, armor
- Big variety of missions
- Realistic 3D shooting and effects
- Training level - here you can develop your shooting skills
- Business levels - here you can earn virtual money
- 6 sniper rifles - they differ in zoom distance, clip size, accuracy
